hackathon-description-text: From food and drinks to keynotes, workshops and satellite happenings, for all your needs and purposes, we got it.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: 100 Experts from the Junction Community will help choose the track winners and serve as a pre-qualifier for the finalists.
Co-founder @ IRC-Galleria, Ninchat, Heimo. Finnish Internet Legend.

hackathon-requirements:
A 
For the 
 You're free to ideate your project beforehand, but to be eligible for prizes, all code must be written at the event. 
 are judged completely seperately, and are decided by the connected partners. You can find their judging criteria from hackjunction.com/

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 20k € for the final winner of Junction 2017.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: 20 000€ - Junction 2017 Main Prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winner: 2000€ gift card to Amazon or Verkkokauppa and a chance to meet the Chief Digital Officer of Nordea or the CEO of Nordea Life & Pension FI to exchange ideas and discuss future opportunities.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Banking re-imagined by Nordea

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 2000€ Giftcard to
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Hit the Jackpot! by Veikkaus

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: All teams that submit a Movesense based project can keep the Movesense sensors used.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Track Anything That Movies Suunto

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 2 x Acer Mixed Reality Headset
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Microsoft WebVR Challenge

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will enjoy a unique behind-the-scenes experience in the shootings of a forthcoming Elisa original series (including travel and accommodation), and will also be offered a role in a group scene.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: My perfect personal movie experience by Elisa

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the winning team receives a HyperX Cloud II Gaming Headset, €100 Steam Gift Voucher (or equivalent for non-gamers), and a Kamu office tour with a Kamu team dinner.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Play beautiful by Kamu

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: All members of the two top teams will get a Suunto Spartan sports watch.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Accessing the law by Castrén & Snellman

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: ESA will offer an attractive price package for the winning team or the individual winner. More on this to come!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Space data enriched applications by ESA

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winner team: 2 000€
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Hack The Job - Abolish the unemployment by KEHA-keskus

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team prize is 1500 €
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Streetreboot 2 by Stara

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winner team:
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Advertise Smartly with AI

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: There’s Patchblocks module x 4 (one for each team member) for the winning team!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Creative Use Of The Spotify Platform by Spotfiy

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team: 1500 € Amazon gift cards
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Robots, learning machines by Eficode and Bitville

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Echo Dot 2nd Generation and AWS credits for every winning team member
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Summarising news by Nordcloud

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Main prize 3000€ gift card to Amazon or Verkkokauppa.com to be shared between the winning team members (equal amount each) and a chance to meet the Chief Technical Officer of Fortum to exchange ideas and discuss future opportunities. Fortum will also reward other commendable ideas that stand out with other smaller prizes.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Smart electricity by Fortum

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will be awarded with a journey to a European capital, including some Smart City experience and a visit to a Stora Enso manufacturing unit of smart building components. The second team will get to attend a free-of-choice course at Siili Adacemy.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Store smarter by Stora Enso

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1000€ gift card to Verkkokauppa/Amazon/Steam… (you name it) for the winning team and hand-picked goodies for our runner-ups
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Transform the way we build worlds! by Trimble

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 3000€ Gift Card
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Unleashing IoT in commercial buildings by Kone

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1st price: Hubsan H501S quadcopters (or equivalent) for the winning team. Honorable mention: Amazon Echo Dot devices for selected teams.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Who needs a light switch by Helvar

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The prize for this challenge is a license to the full Qt developer license. Other prizes will be revealed at a later date, follow this space!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Cross-platform for desktop and embedded by The QT Company

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team members will each get electric bikes. Smaller rewards will be given to outstanding ideas.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Smart services, sustainable choices by Outotec

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will be offered a 4-days trip to Berlin incl. flights and hotel: Come over and join us for a one-day workshop with our experts. Afterwards, we’ll invite you to a fancy dinner in one of Berlin’s nicest neighbourhoods. Let’s make sure you’ll get the best possible start into a Berlin style weekend.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Connected logistics by Fleet Board

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First prize: Each member of the team gets a $ 100 gift voucher to the Amazon
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: WHERE THE #?! IS IT? – RFID helps by Finn-ID

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1000e for main challenge, 500e for best use of API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1000€ – Most Ready
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Hack the fintech environment by Holvi

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Two best solutions are rewarded with Slush 2017 Tickets and are invited to our Developer Community.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Make finance fun. Once and for all. by Bankify

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Making transportation easy by Kyyti

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winner team: 1 000€
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Revolutionizing the rural transport by the Ministry of Transport and Communications

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winner: Finnair flight voucher worth of 200,00 euros (one per team member, max 5)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Main prize 5000€ to be shared between the winning team members.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team: 1 500€, Runner-up team: 500€

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Have you used cutting-edge tech to create something technologically amazing?
Is your hack so creative or cool that it would make even the most seasoned professional say "wow"?
Have you combined themes from several different challenges into a coherent end result? Have you taken advantage of all of the data, API's and other tech available to you at Junction?
Is the result of your hack visually pleasing or otherwise easy to grasp?

hackathon-description-header: Europe's largest hackathon - Building projects defining the next 100 years
hackathon-location-description: Dipoli, Aalto University Campus, Otaniemi, Espoo
